pkgmetadata.longdescription: # craftr-dslA domain specific language purpose-built for the Craftr build system.The Craftr DSL is an "almost superset" of Python 3; adding a lot of syntactical features that make it moreconvenient to describe build configurations at the cost of some other syntax features of the native Pythonlanguage (like set literals).## Installation $ pip install craftr-dslThe `craftr-dsl` package requires at least Python 3.8.## Projects using Craftr DSL* [Novella](https://niklasrosenstein.github.io/novella/)
